mods.abstract: Invoice for an order placed by Alkahest Attractions, Inc. for 200 three color jumbos, 5 one color jumbos (three sheets), 5 one column mats, 5 two column mats, and 5 and 5 mats for a performance by Porter Wagoner and Sonny James at the City Auditorium in Panama City, Florida on June 1. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
